name: Metal Slug 2
overview: As Marco, Eri, Tarma, or Fio, you must defeat the evil General Morden and his henchman. Metal Slug 2 is a run and gun video game developed by SNK. It was originally released in 1998 for the Neo-Geo MVS arcade platform as the sequel to the 1996 game Metal Slug. The game added several new features to the gameplay such as new weapons, vehicles and the ability to transform the character.
